div.b: Is Your Business VAT Registered?

i.title: If your business is registered for VAT then you will normally only be able to request support for costs net of VAT. If you are not VAT registered then you can apply for gross costs, i.e., inclusive of VAT. If you're likely to apply for VAT registration shortly then you should apply for net costs.

div.label: Registered
Not Registered

div.b: Are you applying for gross or net costs?
div.label: Gross
Net

label.b: How many full-time equivalent (FTEs) does your business/organisation currently employ?

i.title: Please state how many part time and full time employees the business currently employs. Full-time means the standard full-time hours that your business/organisation uses. A Ltd company with a single employee director is treated as having no employees. Please refer to the information table for guidance on how to calculate FTEs.

div.p:
Data Protection:
All information provided in connection with this application will be used for assessing and if appropriate monitoring your project and evaluating the scheme. It will be held and used by Cornwall Council and authorised partners and stored on internal computer and/or filing systems; such information will be collected and processed and held secure in accordance with the principles of the Data Protection Act (2018) and the General Data Protection Regulation (EU) 2016/679.

Data Sharing:
The informaiton provided will be used for assessing and where appropriate monitoring your project and evaluating the scheme. We will hold the information that you provide us confidentially on our client.

div.div: Please read and tick the box to confirm you accept the Privacy Agreement.

div.b: Please tick to confirm your understanding of the following:

div.div: You must not start work on your project until the Full Application process is complete and a signed agreement is in place
Any work carried out on your project before the application process is finished will not be eligible or grant support and may invalidate your whole application.
No funding will be given for costs or liabilities incurred before the funding agreement was signed, even if your Full Application is successful.
I declare that I have the authority to represent and enter into contracts for the above named organisation in making this application.

I certify that the entries in this form, accompanying details and any other supporting documents enclosed are, to the best of my knowledge and belief, correct and the investment applied for is the minimum required for the programme/project/work to proceed as described. I am not aware of any reason why the programme/project/work may not proceed or be delayed other than those reasons declared and the commitment can be made within the timescales indicated. I can confirm that the project will meet statutory and regulatory standards, including the Equality Act 2010.
